overview:
Alex Vergej is CEO and President of Iksanika, a provide of offshore software outsourcing services specializing in Rich Internet Applications (RIA), automation business process for small, medium and large enterprises, enterprise application development, development tools, across numerous vertical sectors. Under Vergej’s leadership, Iksanika has aggressive growth to high quality offshore software development outsourcing services company.

Alex Vergej began his career in Minsk, Belarus, where he worked for several most powerful offshore software development outsourcing companies of East Europe. Was worked as representative and Project Manager for big brand companies in United States, Russia, India, was manage international development teams.

In 2000 Alex Vergej has founded the InnoSoft company and in 2006 was initiate migration with Devunion to Iksanika.

Alex Vergej holds a BS in Systems Analyst at Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics. At present Alex Vergej gets MBA at Belarusian State University.

degrees.subject: Engineer Analyst in Electronics / Software & Hardware on each level
